question: Question_08_(c)
statement:
\textbf{Full-Solution Problem. Justify your answer and show your work.
Full simplification of numerical answers is required unless explicitly
stated otherwise.}

Let $\displaystyle y = f(x) = 63x^{2/7}-14x^{9/7}$. Determine the
intervals where $\displaystyle f(x)$ is concave up, and the intervals
where $\displaystyle f(x)$ is concave down.
